text: Apologies for the late reply, that's such a relief to hear! I feel alot less intimidated now, thank you :blush: I've been told it's a good idea to have an online portfolio, Would you recommend it? :thinking_face:

Sure, anything that gets your name out there is a good idea! I'd say post on LinkedIn as well, it can give you some good visibility. If you feel an online blog/portfolio is going to motivate you to practice and get material out, then that's a good shout! Don't be afraid to put up some less good material too, it can help show progression in your work. When it comes to creating the demo reel for job applications, that's when you showcase the best bits :slightly_smiling_face:
Ooohh, noted, thank you so much again! I'll try my best :relaxed:
